full.title: Version
full.description: Json schema version for the vEnvironment-Basic configuration file. Acceptance criteria: equal major version, less/equal minor and patch version.

full.title: Include files
full.description: Include a different file (similar to #include of the c preprocessor). The order of includes does not matter. Circular / multiple includes are resolved correctly.

full.title: Datasources
full.description: The definition of datasources used by application models.

full.title: System Variables
full.description: A lists of system variables to be used by the simulation.

full.title: Version
full.description: Json schema version for the vEnvironment-Basic configuration file. Acceptance criteria: equal major version, less/equal minor and patch version.

full.title: Include files
full.description: Include a different file (similar to #include of the c preprocessor). The order of includes does not matter. Circular / multiple includes are resolved correctly.

full.title: Functional mockup units
full.description: List of functional mockup units.

full.title: SIL Kit
full.description: SIL Kit settings.

participant-name.description: Name used by CANoe4SW to join a simulation as a participant at the start of a measurement.

full.title: Logging Block
full.description: Configuration of the standalone logging block.

full.title: Version
full.description: Json schema version for the vEnvironment-Basic configuration file. Acceptance criteria: equal major version, less/equal minor and patch version.

full.title: Global Settings
full.description: Global settings for all scenarios.

time-source.description:
Time source for the simulation. Operate without hardware and simulate all buses completely. 
'internal-realtime': The time response of the measurement (time basis) is controlled internally. 
'external-software': The time response of the measurement (time basis) is controlled by an external program.

full.title: Functional mockup units
full.description: List of functional mockup units.

full.title: SIL Kit
full.description: SIL Kit settings.

participant-name.description: Name used by the simulation tool to join a simulation as a participant at the start of a measurement.

simulation-step-in-micro-sec.description: Time length of a single simulation step. Valid only for the time-source "external-software".

life-cycle-event-timeout-in-sec.description: Maximum waiting time for the other simulation participants. Valid only for the time-source "external-software".

full.title: Logging Block
full.description: Configuration of the logging for the environment.

full.title: System variables
full.description: Absolute or relative path to an external file containing system variables. Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the defining configuration file.

active-model-variables.description: List of the FMU variables which should be exported

inactive-model-variables.description: List of the FMU variables which should be excluded from the export

full.title: Functional mockup unit
full.description: Represents a functional mockup unit used in a scenario
Absolute or relative path to a SIL Kit config file (.yaml or .json). Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the configuration file.
Name of a blf file, supporting the field codes: {ComputerName}, {LocalTime}, {MeasurementIndex}, {MeasurementStart}, {IncSize|001|100MB} and {IncTime|001|01h00m}.
Advanced logging configurations

active-model-variables.description: List of the FMU variables which should be exported

inactive-model-variables.description: List of the FMU variables which should be excluded from the export

full.title: Functional mockup unit
full.description: Represents a functional mockup unit used in a scenario.
Advanced logging configurations.
Reference to external datasource files (.vcdl/.vcodm). Absolute or relative path. Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the defining configuration file.
Absolute or relative path to a vsysvar file. Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the configuration file.
Absolute or relative path to a source file of a functional mockup unit (.fmu). Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the defining configuration file.
